name: The Tail Of Weisswood
description:
On the eve of the winter solstice, the villagers of Weisswood are preparing for the Yule festival to end winter and welcome spring. When Thorn returns home to discover Krampus has stolen the Yule Log, she sets off to save the village. 

We hope you enjoy our game! This was a small project made in 12 weeks. It should take about 15 minutes to complete.

Enjoy beautiful scenery by Yasemin Kuzu @pr_crastination ,

Funny dialogue and cute illustrations by Isi Archer @isi_archer ,

Cute characters made and animated by Sam Patajac @sampatters_ ,

Programming by Alex Minenna @magicmagpiegame , 

And gorgeous music by Jess Reddi-Coronell @jessreddi_ !

Follow us on twitter for more cool games, art and other amazing content <3
